author: cmpilato
msg: Add a placeholder for node-origins-related documentation.

author: cmpilato
msg: On the 'mergeinfoless-copies' branch, merge outstanding trunk changes.

author: dlr
msg: Document that SQLite must be built in thread-safe mode.  While this
is really true only for threaded server operation, for simplicity's
sake we decree a more general requirement.

author: cmpilato
msg: Per the request in issue #3024, provide a tool (compiled via 'make
contrib') which populates the new node-origins index of Subversion
repositories in the most efficient way possible (other than
organically growing the index as history is created in the repository,
